title: Firefox
comments: + not based on Google Chromium|+ lots of control to user

title: Brave
comments: + privacy focused|+ alternative ad system|- some controversial features (e.g. crypto-rewards, past affiliate links)

title: Tor
comments: + most private browser|+ based on Firefox|- some sites block it|- site usability can be very degraded

title: Epic
comments: + privacy-first|+ unique privacy features|- privacy features may become premium|-source code viewable on request

title: Tutanota
comments: free account 1GB|+ 0-knowledge|- no IMAP| - free account lack features| - no search

title: MailFence
comments: free account 0.5GB|- code reviewable on request only

title: /e/ OS
comments: + installs in 30 mins (good instructions)|+ fully android compatible|+ good UI,UX|+ minimal or no google dependencies|+ good choice of default apps|+ all apps are removable|- device support varies (e.g. camera)
